product_name: Royal Robbins Cool Mesh Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Breathable, soft and wrinkle-resistant, the women's Royal Robbins Cool Mesh Tank Top is a must-pack for your summer trips to Southwest national parks or European landmarks. Open-weave fabric blends cotton and organic cotton, and is naturally soft, breathable and quick drying to keep you comfortable. Front neckline pleats, 3-button placket and contoured seams create more style than a plain tank top. Small zippered pocket at hip secures cash or ID. Royal Robbins Cool Mesh Tank Top features a straight hem with 2 vent slits in front. Closeout.
short_description: Breathable, soft and wrinkle-resistant, the women's Royal Robbins Cool Mesh Tank Top is a must-pack for your summer trips to Southwest national parks or European landmarks.
